ai-tha-ap247:1.2_0: I build a hut with a little hut.
ai-tha-ap247:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap247:2.4_0: and the fruit of ten years.
ai-tha-ap247:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap247:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable the senior venerable Kuṭa.
ai-tha-ap247:5.1_0: and the fifth camel of a Monk.
